ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory.modem.impl

Class DefaultModem

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.nodeFactory.modem.impl.DefaultModem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Modem, ROSNode, org.ros.node.NodeListener, org.ros.node.NodeMain

    public class DefaultModem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Modem
    This is an implementation of ROS part of Modem. Practically it does nothing, all message listening and publishing is done in Encoders and Decoders. The task for this one is only to register into the ROS network and get the ConnectedNode class (factory for everything ROS-related..). Note: encoders and decoders use ConnectedNode obtained from here for everything
